body:
So as you can see I have lost my emerald rank, I had it when I left and now when I come back it's gone. 
I was told to find the receipt of my emerald purchase, but it was so long ago and I don't know how to find it. 
Is there any chance that the sheer fact you know I used to have emerald could get my emerald back? 
Thanks :)
body_tagged:
So as you can see I have lost my emerald rank, I had it when I left and now when I come back it's gone.

Thanks :)
title: I have lost my emerald.

replies.body: Send it to support@avicus.net on email if I'm correct :)
replies.body_tagged: Send it to support@avicus.net on email if I'm correct :)

replies.body: Yeah but I don't know how to find my proof of purchase because it was half a year ago...
replies.body_tagged: Yeah but I don't know how to find my proof of purchase because it was half a year ago...

reply_to.body: Send it to support@avicus.net on email if I'm correct :)
reply_to.body_tagged: Send it to support@avicus.net on email if I'm correct :)

replies.body: I do recall U had an emerald rank. I would email support@avicus.net and tell them about Ur situation. Tell them when u got it and stuff like that
replies.body_tagged: I do recall U had an emerald rank. I would email support@avicus.net and tell them about Ur situation. Tell them when u got it and stuff like that

replies.body: If you used Paypal, look in your account at the transactions.
replies.body_tagged: If you used Paypal, look in your account at the transactions.

replies.body:
As rese said look at the transactions.
Or search in your email you used to make the purchase using the keywords "paypal" or "avicus" and see if you can find the receipt that way. 
Good luck
replies.body_tagged:
As rese said look at the transactions.
Or search in your email you used to make the purchase using the keywords "paypal" or "avicus" and see if you can find the receipt that way. 
Good luck

replies.body: I didn't use an account, I used a prepaid credit card, so I hope I can just go by trust code, because I did have an emerald rank.
replies.body_tagged: I didn't use an account, I used a prepaid credit card, so I hope I can just go by trust code, because I did have an emerald rank.

replies.body: Legally Avicus should be keeping receipts of all transactions :P

replies.body: I totally remember you having emerald, I'll look through any of my views that I recorded with you to see if I can find the Emerald tag next to your name. :D
